p: Seventy μg of each depleted sample was dried using a SpeedVac system, dissolved in iTRAQ dissolution buffer and digested with trypsin. The digested samples were labeled with iTRAQ Reagents (SCIEX, USA) and subsequently pooled into two tubes ( S3 Table). The pooled and iTRAQ labeled samples were purified using two 1 ml Strata X-C 33 μm columns (Phenomenex, Inc.) applying previously described protocols [ 15, 16, 24].
